document_data.caption: A map showing Hardangheight in western Gnarhelm.
document_data.name: Hardangheight
document_data.mainbody: '''Hardangheight''' was a large mountain range located in the kingdom of [[Gnarhelm]] on the island of [[Alaron]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Hardangheight was one of two mountain ranges found in Gnarhelm, and it was by the the largest. Hardangheight covered approximately {{SI|1250|sq mi|k}} of Gnarhelm and was the dominant land feature in the western region of the kingdom. The mountain touched the waters of the [[Sea of Moonshae]] in the north, and reached south to the shores of [[the Vasty Drink]]. Its eastern slopes plunged into [[Salmon Bay]]. The [[Ironflow]] flowed south from Hardangheight's southern slopes.
